DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate thermogenic effect ginger .
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy eutrophic woman receive capsule 200 mg ginger extract ( 5 % active ingredient ) placebo ( cellulose ) , along standardize breakfast , minimum seven day washout period .
DOC.criteria: Females ; Aged 18 60 year old ; Body mass index 18.5 24.9 kg/mÂ² ; Agree sign inform consent . Any chronic health condition ( e.g . diabetes , hypertension , chronic renal failure , heart liver disease ) ; Previous operation weight loss ; Medications know affect total energy expenditure ; Pregnancy breastfeeding ; Smoking ; Alcohol use ( > 2 doses/day ) .
